title: Hour 2: Golden State of Play
description:
Courtney Cronin, Harry Douglas and Brian Windhorst debate if the Warriors should want to trade their young core for Durant. Sam Acho hops in to debate if Lamar Jackson is making a mistake betting on himself. The crew also reacts to the Raiders hiring Sandra Douglass Morgan as their new team president. Last their discuss what the ceiling for the Lakers is with Russell Westbrook.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
